name: Spellmaster's Ward
summary: You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe.
description:
You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe. You gain the spellmaster's ward focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
